metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15306 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in OpenEXR before v2.5.2. Invalid chunkCount attributes could cause a heap buffer overflow in getChunkOffsetTableSize() in IlmImf/ImfMisc.cpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15306` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.3
openexr - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.3').
